meanings.definition: Adopted before officially taking in as one's own.
meanings.sent1: The preadopted puppy quickly became part of the family.
meanings.sent2: The preadopted kitten found a loving home even before the paperwork was finalized.
meanings.sent3: The preadopted teddy bear seemed to wink at the other toys on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her preadopted smile lit up the room, making everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent5: The preadopted plant flourished in its new environment, showing signs of happiness.

meanings.definition: Already chosen for adoption before the official process begins.
meanings.sent1: The preadopted baby was eagerly awaited by the new parents.
meanings.sent2: The preadopted sibling duo brought joy to their new family from the start.
meanings.sent3: The preadopted cake was a sweet surprise waiting for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: His preadopted role as team captain inspired his teammates to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The preadopted book became an instant favorite among the library visitors.
